O sing<S>7891</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> a new<S>2319</S> song<S>7892</S>: sing<S>7891</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, all the earth<S>776</S>.
Sing<S>7891</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, bless<S>1288</S> his name<S>8034</S>; shew forth<S>1319</S> his salvation<S>3444</S> from day<S>3117</S> to day<S>3117</S>.
Declare<S>5608</S> his glory<S>3519</S> among the heathen<S>1471</S>, his wonders<S>6381</S> among all people<S>5971</S>.
For the LORD<S>3068</S> is great<S>1419</S>, and greatly<S>3966</S> to be praised<S>1984</S>: he is to be feared<S>3372</S> above all gods<S>430</S>.
For all the gods<S>430</S> of the nations<S>5971</S> are idols<S>457</S>: but the LORD<S>3068</S> made<S>6213</S> the heavens<S>8064</S>.
Honour<S>1935</S> and majesty<S>1926</S> are before<S>6440</S> him: strength<S>5797</S> and beauty<S>8597</S> are in his sanctuary<S>4720</S>.
Give<S>3051</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, O ye kindreds<S>4940</S> of the people<S>5971</S>, give<S>3051</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> glory<S>3519</S> and strength<S>5797</S>.
Give<S>3051</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> the glory<S>3519</S> due unto his name<S>8034</S>: bring<S>5375</S> an offering<S>4503</S>, and come<S>935</S> into his courts<S>2691</S>. <sup>due: Heb. of his name</sup>
O worship<S>7812</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> in the beauty<S>1927</S> of holiness<S>6944</S>: fear<S>2342</S> before<S>6440</S> him, all the earth<S>776</S>. <sup>in the: or, in the glorious sanctuary</sup>
Say<S>559</S> among the heathen<S>1471</S> that the LORD<S>3068</S> reigneth<S>4427</S>: the world<S>8398</S> also shall be established<S>3559</S> that it shall not be moved<S>4131</S>: he shall judge<S>1777</S> the people<S>5971</S> righteously<S>4339</S>.
Let the heavens<S>8064</S> rejoice<S>8055</S>, and let the earth<S>776</S> be glad<S>1523</S>; let the sea<S>3220</S> roar<S>7481</S>, and the fulness<S>4393</S> thereof. <sup>the fulness: or, all it containeth</sup>
Let the field<S>7704</S> be joyful<S>5937</S>, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees<S>6086</S> of the wood<S>3293</S> rejoice<S>7442</S>
Before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: for he cometh<S>935</S>, for he cometh<S>935</S> to judge<S>8199</S> the earth<S>776</S>: he shall judge<S>8199</S> the world<S>8398</S> with righteousness<S>6664</S>, and the people<S>5971</S> with his truth<S>530</S>.
